content: say hello to your new go-to hat this hat is my absolute favorite to make because it works up quickly has an easy stitch pattern to memorize and uses only one skein of lion brand heartland yarn it s squishy warm and works up so quickly that you can make a bunch to fit the colors of your wardrobe this beanie measures 11 5 tall x 20 circumference / 29 cm x 51 cm circumference but is easily adaptable to any size the ad-free pdf includes a hat template that will help with measuring from preemie to adult large there is also a graphic that helps with determining the circumference and length for common sizes as well as larger 14 point font and printable gift tags this pattern is available to view for free on my website and has been tested there is also a video tutorial to help you along if needed this pattern is copyright 2023 handmade by stacy j please do not duplicate or copy any portion of this pattern as well as photographs you are encouraged to share images of your final product and are allowed to sell final products i just ask that if you sell your final product please purchase the ad-free pdf provide your own photographs and that you please credit handmade by stacy j as the designer thank you for your support
